product_name: Freedom of the Hills - Deck of Cards
long_description: Ante up while you brush up on outdoor essentials. The. Deck of 52 standard playing cards; black-and-white illustrations. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2010. Each card features a topic followed by a short explanation or illustration. Cards are organized by suit: spades review climbing skills, hearts review first-aid skills, diamonds review wilderness skills and clubs review mountain skills.
short_description: Ante up while you brush up on outdoor essentials. The Freedom of the Hills - Deck of Cards offers tips on climbing, mountaineering, wilderness and first-aid skills.
